summary: A new apple garden with new meshes and textures / Un nuovo frutteto con nuove meshes e textures
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellowgreen][color=#3c78d8][size=3]My other mods[/size][/color][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27395][color=#6aa84f]Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns and Villages Enhanced patch[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26742][color=#6aa84f]RCRN 36 _Revamped exterior fog Compatibility Patch[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26286][color=#6aa84f]SIS -Stealth and Immersion Set[/color][/url][color=#6aa84f] [color=#ff7700][i]featured on GEMS[/i]
[line]
[/color][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/7JO7kVr.jpg?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SEGis0X.jpg?2[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/r7P2Jgh.jpg?1[/img]
[i][color=darkcyan][size=6]Apple Garden/Il Giardino delle Mele[/size]
[size=3]this mod is featured on / inserito nella [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Pack:Explorers_Guide]STEP Explorer's guide[/url][/size][/color][/i]

[color=burlywood]This mod adds a new location near Whiterun, new harvestable plants (with new meshes and textures) / Aggiunge un meleto vicino Whiterun con nuovi oggetti e nuove piante che danno frutti e verdure[/color]
[color=red]V.2[/color]: [color=burlywood]Now with Melinda the guardian and merchant. She sells, works, eats, goes to the inn in Whiterun and sleeps[/color]/[color=red]V.2[/color]:[color=burlywood] Ora con Melinda la guardiana del meleto. Lei vende, lavora, mangia, si diverte alla taverna di Whiterun e dorme.[/color]
[color=green]Files in English / Italiano[/color]
[size=3][color=yellow]Requires Skyrim version 1.9 or higher / E' necessario Skyrim 1.9 o maggiore [/color][/size]
[size=3][color=yellow]Now cleaned with TES5edit 3.0.32 / Controllato con TES5edit 3.0.32[/color][/size][/center]

[color=green]INSTALLATION:[/color]

Copy the "Apple Garden" esp and bsa in your Data folder / Copiate il file "Apple garden" esp e bsa nella cartella DATA

[color=green]DISINSTALLATION:[/color]

Remove "Apple garden" esp and bsa" from your Data folder / Cancellate "Apple Garden" esp e bsa dalla cartella DATA


CREDITS (new meshes and textures)
ChickenDownUnder
InsanitySorrow
author: Improbabile
